name: Makhla Muktadhara Rehabilitation Centre for the Disabled

address: 15/6/C, Iswar Chowdhury Road, Madhya Para, P.O. Rahara, Khardaha
Iswar Chowdhury Road, Madhya Para, P.O. Rahara, Khardaha, Kolkata

briefDescription: Makhla Muktadhara Rehabilitation Centre for the Disabled is a registered NGO operational since 1997-98. It works upon the issue of Disability, Disability Rights and Holistic Child Rights through Community Based Rehabilitation, Rights Based, Inclusive, Behaviour Change and Communication Approach. It has been working in Chanditala I & II Blocks & Dankuni Municipality covering 106 villages in 14 Gram Panchayets & 19 Wards in Hooghly District, West Bengal. It has identified, reached & provided services to 3005 children with disabilities & 19675 adults (including 5973 disabled youths and adults). MMRCD works in close collaboration and coordination with the Governance, Administration, NIOH, NIMH, NIHH, NIVH, Disabilities Commission.
